[[module CSS]]

#main-content::before {
    color: black;
    content: "ⓘ 곧 대규모 업데이트가 이루어집니다!";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 800;
    background: #f3f4f6;
    padding: 5px 5px 5px 5px;
    border-radius: 4px;
    margin-top: 3rem;
    display: block;
    width: fit-content;
    padding-right: 25px;
}

#page-title {
margin-top: 1rem;
}

table {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    font-weight: 500;
}

table strong {
    font-weight: 800 !important;
}

#page-content .wiki-content-table {
    width: 33%;
}

.basaltBanner p {
    line-height: 0px;
    margin-top: 1rem;
    margin-bottom: 3rem;
}

.basaltBanner,
.basaltIcon {
    transition-duration: 0.3s;
    transition-property: transform, box-shadow, filter, background-image;
    transform: translateZ(0);
}

.basaltBanner:hover {
    transform: scale(0.9);
}

.basaltIcon:hover {
    transform: scale(1.1);
    box-shadow: inset 0px 0px 0px 7px rgb(20, 20, 20);
}

.basaltIcon:hover>div {
    filter: drop-shadow(0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8));
}

.bannerLabel {
    width: 415px;
    margin: 2.5em auto 0;
    background: black;
    border: 1px solid black;
    color: white;
    font-size: 25%;
    font-weight: 300;
}

.bannerLabel p {
    margin: .6em;
    letter-spacing: 1em;
    text-indent: 1em;
}

@media (max-width: 767px) {
    .themeText {
     display: none;
    }

    .bannerLabel {
        width: 240px;
    }

    .bannerLabel p {
        text-indent: .5em;
    }

    .responsive tr {
        display: flex;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
    }
}
[[/module]]

[[module Rate]]

[[include info:start]]
**현무암 테마**
**원작:** https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/theme:basalt
**저자:** [[*user Liryn]], [[*user Placeholder McD]]
**역자:** [[*user Denevola]]
----
테마 설정과 색상 맞춤 설정은 원문 변경에 따른 자동 업데이트가 불가합니다. 문제가 발생할 경우 페이지 토론이나 [[[chat-guide | 대화방]]]을 통해 알려주세요.
[[include info:end]]

[[div style="background: linear-gradient(180deg, transparent 50%, rgba(248,248,248,1) 100%); border-left: solid 3px grey; padding: 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem 1.5rem; box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3);"]]

+ [[size 80%]]●[[/size]] 이건 뭔가요?

@@ @@

현무암 테마는 미학적인 양식으로 그 어떤 카논이나 시리즈, 요주의 단체와도 무관하며, [[*user Azamo]]와 [[*user Placeholder McD]]가 [[user EstrellaYoshte]]의 [[[theme:paperstack | 서류더미 테마]]]를 발전시켜 만들었습니다.

[[[theme:black-highlighter-theme | 블랙 하이라이터]]]와 마찬가지로 현무암 테마는 사이트 레이아웃의 많은 부분을 개선했고, 대부분의 테마에선 생략되는 UI 요소들도 생산성과 사용자 접근성 향상을 위해 다수 변경했습니다. 근사해 보이기까지 하고요.

= [[span class="bigtext"]]현무암 테마를 사용하려면 다음 코드를 글에 붙여넣으세요.[[/span]]

[[div class="blockquote" style="max-width: fit-content; background: rgb(20, 20, 20); border-color: rgb(20, 20, 20); color: #EDEDED; font-size: 110%; margin: auto; word-break: break-all !important;"]]
{{@@[[include :scpko:theme:basalt]]@@}}
[[/div]]

[[/div]]

+ [[size 80%]]● [[/size]] 테마 설정

@@ @@

테마 설정, 변수라고도 하는 이것들은 사용자가 현무암 테마에 특정 기능을 더하거나 빼 주는 모듈을 가져오는 부가적인 문자열입니다.

설정을 적용하려면 일반 include **맨 뒤**의 닫는 괄호(]]) **앞에** 아래 예시 중 하나를 붙여넣어 보세요. 

[[div class="blockquote" style="max-width: fit-content; background: rgb(20, 20, 20); border-color: rgb(20, 20, 20); color: #EDEDED; margin: auto;"]]
{{@@[[include :scpko:theme:basalt @@##75ff83|테마설정=a##@@]]@@}}
[[/div]]

테마 설정들은 손쉽게 혼용할 수 있습니다. 한 번에 여러 개를 사용하려면 아래처럼 해 주세요.

[[/div]]

+++ //사이트 제목/부제목/로고 바꾸기//

헤더의 사이트 제목, 부제목 그리고 로고를 바꾸고 싶다면 다음 코드를 사용하세요.

[[div class="blockquote" style="width: fit-content; background: rgb(20, 20, 20); border-color: rgb(20, 20, 20); color: #EDEDED; font-size: 90%; margin: auto;"]]
{{@@:root {@@}}
{{@@    --logo: url(@@##c8c7ff|<이미지 링크 자리>##@@);@@}}
{{@@    --title: "@@##c8c7ff|<제목 텍스트 자리>##@@";@@}}
{{@@    --subtitle: "@@##c8c7ff|<부제목 텍스트 자리>##@@";@@}}
{{@@}@@}}
[[/div]]

[[span style="background: #141414; border-radius: 4px; padding: 3px 3px 3px 3px; font-size: 90%;"]]{{**##c8c7ff|@@--@@title##**}}[[/span]] 속성은 기본 텍스트와 같은 길이(혹은 더 짧게)로 입력할 것을 권장합니다. 모바일 기기에서 표시 문제가 생기는 것을 방지하기 위함입니다.

기본 설정으로, 사이드바의 로고와 텍스트는 헤더와 동일합니다. 이 부분을 바꾸고 싶다면 다음 코드를 사용하세요.

[[div class="blockquote" style="width: fit-content; background: rgb(20, 20, 20); border-color: rgb(20, 20, 20); color: #EDEDED; font-size: 90%; margin: auto;"]]
{{@@:root {@@}}
{{@@    --sidelogo: url(@@##c8c7ff|<이미지 링크 자리>##@@);@@}}
{{@@    --sidesubtitle: "@@##c8c7ff|<텍스트 자리>##@@";@@}}
{{@@}@@}}
[[/div]]

@@ @@

+++ //구성요소//

현무암 테마는 커뮤니티 제작 구성요소 몇 가지를 선 포함하고 있습니다.

[[div style="font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif; color: black; font-weight: 700; font-size: 110%;"]]
* [[[component:toggle-sidebar |]]] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]
* [[[component:acs-animation |]]] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]
* [[[component:image-block-peppo |]]] by [[*user PeppersGhost]]
* [[[component:betterfootnotes |]]] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]
[[/div]]

...그리고 별도로 include해 사용하는 //이 구성요소들//도 외형에 변화를 주었습니다.

[[div style="font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif; color: black; font-weight: 700; font-size: 110%;"]]
* [[[component:info-ayers |정보 바]]] by [[*user Ayers]]
* [[[component:anomaly-class-bar |변칙존재 등급분류 바(ACS)]]] by [[*user Woedenaz]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="border-top: dashed 2px #333; width: 25rem; margin-top: 15px; margin-bottom: 15px;"]]
[[/div]]

+++ //테마//

현무암 테마는 이 테마들로부터 일부 요소를 --훔쳐-- 빌려옵니다.

[[div style="font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif; color: black; font-weight: 700; font-size: 110%;"]]

* [[[theme:simple-yonder |]]] by [[*user EstrellaYoshte]]

수평줄은 하이픈 4개 "@@----@@" 를 입력하면 만들어지며, 따로 들어 있는 곳 (인용 블록 등) 이 없다면 페이지 전체를 가로지릅니다. 이 글에서 섹션을 나누는 줄은 모두 이 수평줄입니다.

[http://www.google.com 여러분이 방문했을 법한 링크]

-----

제목은 문장 맨 앞에 "+"를 1~6개 입력해서 적용할 수 있습니다.

[[collapsible show="+ 제목" hide="- 제목"]]
+ 1단계 제목

++ 2단계 제목

+++ 3단계 제목

++++ 4단계 제목

+++++ 5단계 제목

++++++ 6단계 제목
[[/collapsible]]

[[span class="bigtext"]]이건 큰 텍스트 span입니다. 만드려면[[/span]] [[span style="background: #141414; border-radius: 4px; padding: 3px 3px 3px 3px; font-size: 90%;"]]{{**##c8c7ff|@@[[span class="bigtext"]]@@##**}}[[/span]] [[span class="bigtext"]]를 사용하세요.[[/span]]

[[span class="st"]]이건 특수 텍스트 span입니다. 만드려면[[/span]] [[span style="background: #141414; border-radius: 4px; padding: 3px 3px 3px 3px; font-size: 90%;"]]{{**##c8c7ff|@@[[span class="st"]]@@##**}}[[/span]] [[span class="st"]]를 사용하세요.[[/span]]
[[span class="st"]]특수 텍스트 span이 색 입힌 표 div 속에 들어가면, 저 아래처럼 색상이 바뀝니다.[[/span]] ^^Placeholder를 위해 만들었습니다.^^

[[module CSS show="true"]]
/*
 
    BASALT Theme

*/

@font-face {
    font-family: 'NanumPotato';

    font-weight: 200;
    font-display: swap;
}
 
@font-face {
    font-family: 'NanumPotato';
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/denevola/nanumpotato@89e22fb/dist/web/woff2/NanumPotatoLight.woff2') format('woff2'), url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/denevola/nanumpotato@89e22fb/dist/web/woff/NanumPotatoLight.woff') format('woff');
    font-weight: 300;
    font-display: swap;
}
 
@font-face {

    font-weight: 400;

}
 
@font-face {

    font-weight: 600;
    font-display: swap;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'GmarketSans';
    size-adjust: 90%;
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_2001@1.1/GmarketSansLight.woff') format('woff');
    font-weight: 300;
    font-display: swap;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'GmarketSans';
    size-adjust: 90%;
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_2001@1.1/GmarketSansMedium.woff') format('woff');
    font-weight: 500;
    font-display: swap;
}

@font-face {
    font-family: 'GmarketSans';
    size-adjust: 90%;
    src: url('https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/projectnoonnu/noonfonts_2001@1.1/GmarketSansBold.woff') format('woff');
    font-weight: 800;
    font-display: swap;
}

/* MAIN */

/* ======================= */

:root {
    --title: " SCP 재단";
    --subtitle: " 확보 • 격리 • 보호";
}

body {
    font-family: 'Roboto', 'NanumPotato', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* HEADER & TOPBAR */

/* ======================= */

#extra-div-1::before {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#extra-div-2::before {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#top-bar {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#login-status > span {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */



/* SIDEBAR */

/* ======================= */

#u-sb-button {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#side-bar {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#side-bar::before {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#side-bar .heading {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* TABS */

/* ======================= */

ul.yui-nav a {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* TAGS */

/* ======================= */

#main-content .page-tags a {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT */

/* ======================= */

h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6 {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* CONTENT > CUSTOM DIVS */

/* ======================= */

.raisa_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.raisa_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "재단 기록정보보안행정처(RAISA) 공지\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.classification_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.classification_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "분류위원회 공문\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.ettra_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.ettra_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "긴급위협전술대응기관(ETTRA) 공지\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.ethics_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.ethics_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "윤리위원회 공문\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.temporal_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.temporal_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "시간변칙부\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.overwatch_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.overwatch_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "감시사령부\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.miscomm_memo {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.miscomm_memo>p:nth-child(1)::before {
    content: "의사불통학부(DoMC) 공지\00000a";
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
    word-break: keep-all;
}

.bigtext {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.st {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT > TABLES */

/* ======================= */

#page-content .wiki-content-table tr th {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT > RATING MODULE */

/* ======================= */

.rate-points {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT > IMAGE BLOCK */

/* ======================= */

.scp-image-block .scp-image-caption p {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT > COLLAPSIBLES */

/* ======================= */

a.collapsible-block-link {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* CONTENT > PAGE TITLE / BREADCRUMBS */

/* ======================= */

#page-title,
.meta-title {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#breadcrumbs {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* MISC */

/* ======================= */

select {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

input {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.w-container {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.anom-bar-container,
.anom-bar-container * {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif !important;
}

#page-content div.warning-box, #page-content div.warning {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif !important;
}

.collection {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.footer-wikiwalk-nav a, .footer-wikiwalk-nav p {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* MISC > WIKIDOT OWINDOW */

/* ======================= */

#owindow-1>div.title.modal-header {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#owindow-1>div.content.modal-body td.active>b {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#owindow-1 {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */


/* MISC > EDIT BOX & PAGE SOURCE */

/* ======================= */

#lock-info {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#edit-page-form>table.edit-page-bottomtable>tbody>tr>td:nth-child(1)>div.sub,
#edit-page-form>table.form>tbody>tr>td:nth-child(1) {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#edit-page-form>table.edit-page-bottomtable>tbody>tr>td:nth-child(1)>div:nth-child(1) {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

input#edit-page-title.text {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

textarea {
    font-family: 'Roboto', 'NanumPotato', sans-serif;
}

.page-source {
    font-family: 'Roboto', 'NanumPotato', sans-serif;
}

/* ======================= */

.edit-help-34 {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

.printuser a {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

form,
#action-area>p,
table.page-files td span {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#action-area>table>thead>tr,
#revision-list>table>tbody>tr:nth-child(1) {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

#page-info {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}

td:nth-child(1)>a {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;
}


/* MISC > BUTTONS */

/* ======================= */

a.btn.btn-danger,
a.btn.btn-primary,
.btn-small,
#owindow-1>div.button-bar.modal-footer>a,
#edit-cancel-button,
#edit-diff-button,
#edit-preview-button,
#edit-save-draft-button,
#edit-save-continue-button,
#edit-save-button,
#owindow-1>div.content.modal-body>div>a.btn.btn-default {
    font-family: 'Work Sans', 'GmarketSans', sans-serif;

/* DARK MODE ACS BY NAGIROS (NIGHT RUSH) */


/* And God saw all that He had made, and behold, it was very good. */

:root {
    --five-color: 255, 34, 68 !important;
    /*  red  */
    --four-color: 255, 141, 54 !important;
    /*  orange  */
    --three-color: 255, 226, 82 !important;
    /*  yellow  */
    --two-color: 40, 135, 189 !important;
    /*  blue  */
    --one-color: 0, 160, 40 !important;
    /*  green  */
    --white-bar: 207, 207, 207;
    --lg-bar: 118, 118, 130;
    --gray-bg: 66, 66, 72;
}

.anom-bar>.bottom-box {
    /*  horizontal bar  */
    box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: 0 -0.5rem 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
}

.bottom-box>.diamond-part {
    /*  vertical bar  */
    box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(207, 207, 207) !important;
    box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: -0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--white-bar, 207, 207, 207)) !important;
}

.anom-bar-container.esoteric .text-part .main-class,
.anom-bar-container.explained .text-part .main-class,
.anom-bar-container.neutralized .text-part .main-class,
.anom-bar-container.pending .text-part .main-class {
    background-color: rgba(66, 66, 72, .5) !important;
    background-color: rgba(var(--gray-bg, 66, 66, 72), .5) !important;
    border-left-color: rgb(118, 118, 130) !important;
    border-left-color: rgb(var(--lg-bar, 118, 118, 130)) !important;
}

.danger-diamond>.arrows,
.danger-diamond>.bottom-icon::before {
    /*  inverted arrows, esoteric icons  */
    filter: invert(90%) !important;
    -webkit-filter: invert(90%) !important;
}

.danger-diamond>.quadrants>.bottom-quad,
.anom-bar-container.explained .danger-diamond>.quadrants>.top-quad,
.anom-bar-container.neutralized .danger-diamond>.quadrants>.top-quad,
.anom-bar-container.pending .danger-diamond>.quadrants>.top-quad {
    /*  "transparent" bottoms/top icon backgrounds  */
    background-color: rgb(26, 26, 26) !important;
    /*  body background color  */
}

.danger-diamond>.bottom-icon,
.anom-bar-container.pending .danger-diamond>.top-icon::before {
    /*  esoteric, pending icon backgrounds  */
    background-color: rgb(3, 3, 3) !important;
}

.acs-hybrid-text-bar>.acs-clear>.clearance-level-text::before,
.acs-hybrid-text-bar>.acs-disrupt .disruption-class-number::before,
.acs-hybrid-text-bar>.acs-risk .risk-class-number::before {
    /*  hybrid text fixes  */
    color: rgb(237, 237, 237) !important;
    /*  text color  */
}

#page-content .contain-class .class-text::before {
    color: rgb(237, 237, 237) !important;
}

.acs-hybrid-version.acs-yes .acs-secondary,
.acs-hybrid-version.acs-esoteric .acs-contain,
.acs-hybrid-version.acs-explained .acs-contain,
.acs-hybrid-version.acs-neutralized .acs-contain,
.acs-hybrid-version.acs-pending .acs-contain {
    /*  hybrid vertical bars  */
    box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(118, 118, 130) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(118, 118, 130) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(118, 118, 130) !important;
    box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--lg-bar, 118, 118, 130)) !important;
    -webkit-box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--lg-bar, 118, 118, 130)) !important;
    -moz-box-shadow: inset 0.5rem 0 0 0 rgb(var(--lg-bar, 118, 118, 130)) !important;
}

.acs-hybrid-version.acs-pending .acs-contain {
    background-color: rgba(66, 66, 72, .5) !important;
    background-color: rgba(var(--gray-bg, 66, 66, 72), .5) !important;
}

    background-size: contain;
    background-position: top center;
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
}

.table1 .scp-image-block img,
.table1 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    outline: solid 1px rgb(var(--one-color));

}

.table2 .scp-image-block img,
.table2 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    outline: solid 1px rgb(var(--two-color));
    background-color: rgb(10, 10, 10);
    color: #ffffff;
}

.table3 .scp-image-block img,
.table3 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    outline: solid 1px rgb(var(--three-color));
    background-color: rgb(10, 10, 10);
    color: #ffffff;
}

.table4 .scp-image-block img,
.table4 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    outline: solid 1px rgb(var(--four-color));
    background-color: rgb(10, 10, 10);
    color: #ffffff;
}

.table5 .scp-image-block img,
.table5 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {
    outline: solid 1px rgb(var(--five-color));
    background-color: rgb(10, 10, 10);
    color: #ffffff;
}

.table6 .scp-image-block img,
.table6 .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {

[[module CSS]]

body {
    background-color: #380004;
    background-image: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/component%3Aanomaly-class-bar/galactic.jpg");
    background-attachment: fixed;
    background-size: contain;
    background-blend-mode: overlay;
}

body:before {
  content: ' ';
  position: fixed;
  display: block;
  left: 0;
  top: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  background-image: linear-gradient(to bottom, transparent, #0c0c0c 75%, #0c0c0c 75%, #0c0c0c 100%);
}

hr {
background: transparent;
border-top: double 3px #b10009;
}

.notation hr, .jotting hr, .darkdocument hr, .modal hr, .smallmodal hr, div.blockquote hr, .blockquote hr, blockquote hr {
border-top: solid 2px grey;
}

#extra-div-1 {
background: linear-gradient( 180deg, rgb(10, 10, 10) 0%, rgb(60, 0, 0) 100%);
box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 4px rgb(0 0 0);
}

#side-bar {
    background: linear-gradient(
0deg
 , rgba(10, 10, 10, 1) 87%, rgb(27 5 5) 100%);
}

a {
    color: #ff3838;
    font-weight: 600;
}

a.newpage {
    color: #ff6b6b;
    font-weight: 600;
}

a:visited {
    color: #ff1414;
    font-weight: 600;
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: linear-gradient(
180deg
, rgba(10, 10, 10, 1) 0%, rgb(35, 0, 1) 100%);
border: solid 2px rgb(35, 0, 1);
}

#side-bar .side-block.resources {
    background: rgb(10, 0, 1);
}

#side-bar .side-block.media {
    background-color: rgb(5 5 5) !important;
    border-bottom: solid 2px rgb(10, 10, 10);
    border-top: solid 2px rgb(10 10 10);
}

::selection {
    background-color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 0.7);
    color: white;
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {

}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {

}

.bigtext {
color: rgb(var(--five-color));
}

.scp-image-block img, .scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {

}

.footer-wikiwalk-nav a {

[[module CSS]]

:root {
--sidelogo: url(https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/local--files/theme:basalt/basalt_logotype_darkmode.png);
}

#side-bar {
    background: linear-gradient( 0deg, rgba(20, 20, 20, 1) 87%, rgba(5, 5, 5, 1) 100%);
    color: #EDEDED;
}

#side-bar::before {
    border-color: #EDEDED;
}

#side-bar a {
    color: #EDEDED;
}

#side-bar a:visited {
    color: #EDEDED;
}

#side-bar img,
iframe.scpnet-interwiki-frame {
    filter: grayscale(100%) saturate(0%) invert(100%);
    -webkit-filter: grayscale(100%) saturate(0%) invert(100%);
}

#side-bar .side-block {
    background: linear-gradient( 180deg, rgba(25, 25, 25, 1) 0%, rgba(10, 10, 10, 1) 100%);
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 8px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.7);
}

#side-bar .side-block.media {
    background-color: rgb(25, 25, 25) !important;
    border-bottom: solid 4px rgb(19, 19, 19);
    border-top: solid 2px rgb(19, 19, 19);
}

#side-bar .heading {
    color: #EDEDED;
    border-bottom: solid 1px #F9F9F9;
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-folded {
    filter: invert(1);
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link {
    border-bottom: solid 1px #EDEDED;
}

#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link,
#side-bar .collapsible-block-unfolded-link .collapsible-block-link:hover {
    color: #F9F9F9;
}

#side-bar .side-block.resources {
    background: #101010;
}

#side-bar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
    background: rgb(40, 40, 40);
}

#side-bar::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb:hover {
    background: rgb(55, 55, 55);
}

#side-bar::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
    background: rgb(20, 20, 20) !important;
}
